short_description: Research on analyzing large-scale genomic data using machine learning algorithms.
detailed_description: This project aimed to develop novel methods for analyzing genomic data using artificial intelligence. We created predictive models to detect genetic mutations associated with rare diseases.

short_description: Exploring new approaches to create efficient AI models for image recognition.
detailed_description: The project focused on developing deep learning algorithms with a strong emphasis on computational efficiency. We proposed new neural network architectures and optimized their performance for resource-constrained environments.

short_description: A study on the long-term effects of climate change using predictive models.
detailed_description: This research utilized machine learning techniques to model the potential impacts of climate change on biodiversity. The models were designed to predict species distribution changes under various climate scenarios.
